string-array.name: tool_description
string-array.item: Pickaxes are one of the most commonly used tools in the game, being required to mine all ores and many other types of blocks.
Axes are tools used to ease the process of collecting wood based items.
Shovels are tools used to ease the process of collecting dirt and other blocks.
Swords are the most effective melee weapon for killing creatures and players. Many blocks can be destroyed quicker with a sword, although it comes at the cost of 2 durability points to the sword.

Used as a weapon to fire arrows. To fire, make it your active item and right-click to shoot it. There must be arrows in your inventory. Bows are effective weapons for killing dangerous creatures from far away.

Arrows can be fired with a bow, or out of a dispenser, to damage players and creatures. When fired on a parallel plane, arrows will fly ~15 blocks. When fired at a 45 degree angle, they will fly ~50 blocks. Arrows can be picked up after they are fired.

Head armor adds extra protection, preventing damage from attacks, falling, drowning and fire. Protection is displayed via a separate health bar with up to 10 armor points. Damage reduction is calculated from a percentage of effective armor points. Each armor point reduces the damage taken by 8%, 80% being the maximum reduction with 10 armor points.
